Class ex15

java.lang.Object
ex15
All Implemented Interfaces:
ex15interface
public class ex15 extends Object implements ex15interface
Class representing a line with coordinates of its start and end points.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ex15()
    Constructor for creating a line starting at (0,0) and ending at (1,1).
    ex15(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY)
    Constructor for creating a line with specified start and end coordinates.
